statements: SELECT * FROM luxury_travel_packages WHERE availability = TRUE
SELECT package_name, destination, price FROM luxury_travel_packages WHERE price < 1000
SELECT package_id, package_name, destination FROM luxury_travel_packages WHERE destination = 'Maldives'
SELECT * FROM luxury_travel_packages WHERE price BETWEEN 500 AND 1500
SELECT package_name, price FROM luxury_travel_packages ORDER BY price ASC
SELECT * FROM luxury_travel_packages WHERE price > 1000 ORDER BY package_name DESC
SELECT package_name, destination, price FROM luxury_travel_packages WHERE availability = true ORDER BY price ASC
SELECT package_id, destination FROM luxury_travel_packages WHERE price BETWEEN 500 AND 1500
SELECT * FROM luxury_travel_packages WHERE destination = 'Maldives' OR destination = 'Santorini'
SELECT COUNT(package_id) AS total_packages, AVG(price) AS average_price FROM luxury_travel_packages
SELECT package_id, package_name, destination, price, availability FROM travel_packages;
SELECT * FROM travel_packages WHERE availability = TRUE;
SELECT destination, package_name, price FROM travel_packages ORDER BY destination ASC;
SELECT package_id, package_name, price FROM travel_packages WHERE price > 1000 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT package_name, destination, booking_date FROM travel_packages JOIN bookings ON travel_packages.package_id = bookings.package_id;
SELECT * FROM travel_packages WHERE destination = 'Paris';
SELECT package_id, package_name, price FROM travel_packages WHERE price > 1000 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT package_name, destination, price FROM travel_packages WHERE availability = true AND price BETWEEN 500 AND 1000 ORDER BY destination ASC;
SELECT package_name, destination, booking_date FROM travel_packages JOIN bookings ON travel_packages.package_id = bookings.package_id WHERE booking_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM bookings WHERE confirmation_status = 'confirmed' ORDER BY package_id ASC, booking_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM luxury_travel_package;
SELECT package_id, package_name, location FROM luxury_travel_package;
SELECT package_name, price FROM luxury_travel_package WHERE availability = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM booking ORDER BY booking_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, booking_date FROM booking WHERE package_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM luxury_travel_package;
SELECT package_name, location FROM luxury_travel_package WHERE price > 1000 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM booking b JOIN luxury_travel_package p ON b.package_id = p.package_id WHERE b.booking_date >= '2022-01-01';

SELECT p.package_name, r.confirm_date FROM luxury_travel_package p JOIN booking b ON p.package_id = b.package_id JOIN reservation_confirmation r ON b.booking_id = r.booking_id WHERE r.confirmation_status = 'Confirmed' ORDER BY r.confirm_date ASC LIMIT 5;

SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_bookings, AVG(price) AS average_price FROM booking b JOIN luxury_travel_package p ON b.package_id = p.package_id WHERE p.availability = TRUE GROUP BY p.package_name HAVING total_bookings > 2 ORDER BY average_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM luxury_travel_packages;
SELECT package_name, description, price FROM luxury_travel_packages WHERE availability = TRUE;
SELECT experience_name, location FROM experiences WHERE price < 100.00;
SELECT customer_name, booking_date FROM bookings WHERE confirmation_code LIKE 'ABC%';
SELECT package_name, description, price, availability FROM luxury_travel_packages ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM luxury_travel_packages;
SELECT package_name, price FROM luxury_travel_packages ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT package_name, description FROM luxury_travel_packages WHERE availability = TRUE;
SELECT booking_id, customer_name, booking_date FROM bookings ORDER BY booking_date ASC;
SELECT experience_name, location FROM experiences WHERE availability = TRUE ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT * FROM travel_packages;
SELECT package_name, price FROM travel_packages WHERE availability = true;
SELECT * FROM experiences ORDER BY location DESC, duration_hours ASC;
SELECT * FROM bookings WHERE booking_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM users WHERE phone_number IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM travel_packages WHERE price > 1000 ORDER BY package_name DESC;
SELECT experience_name, location, duration_hours FROM experiences WHERE price < 500 ORDER BY location ASC, duration_hours DESC;
SELECT user_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM users WHERE phone_number IS NULL ORDER BY last_name, first_name;
SELECT * FROM bookings WHERE booking_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' AND package_id IN (SELECT package_id FROM travel_packages WHERE availability = TRUE);

SELECT booking_id, u.first_name, u.last_name, p.package_name, b.booking_date FROM bookings b JOIN users u ON b.user_id = u.user_id JOIN travel_packages p ON b.package_id = p.package_id ORDER BY b.booking_date ASC;
